verses.content: Aw mi thilthawtheitak nauhai, LALPA kuomah pe unla, LALPA kuoma chun ropuina le hrâtna pe ro.
LALPA kuomah a hming ropuina chu pe unla, Inthieng mawina inbelin LALPA chu chibai bûk ro,
LALPA râwl chu tuihai chunga chun ân rih a, Ropuina Pathien chu a hung inri dur dur a, LALPA ngei chu tui tamtak chunghaia chun a hung in- rih a,
LALPA râwl chu thilthawtheitak a na, LALPA râwl chu ropuitak a nih.
LALPA râwl chun Sidar thinghai chu sukthliek a ta, Anih, LALPA chun Lebanon tlânga sidar thinghai chu a sukthliek seng sung hlak.
Bâwngte tuoltla angin ân changtir hlak a, Lebanon chu bâwngte tuoltla angin ân châwmtir hlak a, Sirion tlânghai chu ramsiel tê ang elin.
LALPA râwl chun meichawkhai chu a thlêr hlak a.
LALPA râwl chun thlalêr a tlawr hnîng a; LALPA chun Kades thlalêr chu a sukhnîng hlak.
LALPA râwl chun sazukpui chu tê ân siettir a, Rampui thinghnahai chu a nuoi kawl vawng hlak a: A biekina chun thil iengkimin, “A ropui ie,” an ti seng hlak.
LALPA chu Tuilêt lai khan lalah a ṭhung a, Anih, LALPA chu kumkhuoa dingin lalah a ṭhung a nih.
LALPA chun a mihai kuomah hrâtna pêng a ta, LALPA chun a mihai chu thla- muongnain malsâwm a tih.
